languages.text: {n}Отблески десятков свечей играют на лице Джай, придавая ее улыбке еще большую загадочность:{/n} "Шерин! Сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великий{/g} свел наши пути в тот день, когда вы преступили порог Владайма. Он же привел нас к грузу и благословил на его возвращение. Знаете, как говорят на моем мире в таких случаях? 'Приобретя, да поделись с ближним'!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Отблески десятков свечей играют на лице Джай, придавая ее улыбке еще большую загадочность:{/n} "Шерин! Сам {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Великий{/g} свел наши пути в тот день, когда вы преступили порог Владайма. Он же привел нас к грузу и благословил на его возвращение. Знаете, как говорят на моем мире в таких случаях? 'Приобретя, да поделись с ближним'!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}The flickering light of dozens of candles plays across Jae's face, making her small smile appear even more mysterious.{/n} "Shereen! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} Himself brought us together the day you crossed Vladaym's threshold. He led us to the cargo and gave His blessing for its return. Do you know what people on my world say when such a thing happens? 'What's gained is to be shared with your neighbour.'"
languages.original_text: {n}Отблески десятков свечей играют на лице Джай, придавая ее улыбке еще большую загадочность:{/n} "Шерин! Знаете, как говорят на моем мире в таких случаях? 'Приобретя, да поделись с ближним'!"

languages.text: {n}几十根蜡烛闪烁的光芒在婕伊的脸上打着转，这让她的微笑看起来更加神秘莫测。{/n}“亲爱的！自从你跨进弗拉迪姆的领土的那天起，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}便亲自指引我们走到了一起。祂带领我们找到了货物，还赐予了祂的祝福，让那些货物物归原主。每当发生这种事情的时候，你知道我们那边的人都会怎么说吗？他们会说：‘要与邻人分享你的收获。’”
languages.original_text: {n}The flickering light of dozens of candles plays across Jae's face, making her small smile appear even more mysterious.{/n} "Shereen! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} Himself brought us together the day you crossed Vladaym's threshold. He led us to the cargo and gave His blessing for its return. Do you know what people on my world say when such a thing happens? 'What's gained is to be shared with your neighbour.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}几十根蜡烛闪烁的光芒在婕伊的脸上打着转，这让她的微笑看起来更加神秘莫测。{/n}“亲爱的！自从你跨进弗拉迪姆的领土的那天起，{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}至高无上的神皇{/g}便亲自指引我们走到了一起。祂带领我们找到了货物，还赐予了祂的祝福，让那些货物物归原主。每当发生这种事情的时候，你知道我们那边的人都会怎么说吗？他们会说：‘要与邻人分享你的收获。’”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}La luz titilante de decenas de velas se mueve por el rostro de Jae, dando un toque aún más misterioso a su leve sonrisa.{/n} «¡Shereen! El mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g} nos unió el día que cruzaste el umbral de Vladaym. Nos guio hasta el cargamento y dio Su bendición para su regreso. ¿Sabe lo que la gente de mi mundo dice cuando pasa algo así? "Lo que se gana es para compartirlo con los vecinos"».
languages.original_text: {n}The flickering light of dozens of candles plays across Jae's face, making her small smile appear even more mysterious.{/n} "Shereen! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} Himself brought us together the day you crossed Vladaym's threshold. He led us to the cargo and gave His blessing for its return. Do you know what people on my world say when such a thing happens? 'What's gained is to be shared with your neighbour.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}La luz titilante de decenas de velas se mueve por el rostro de Jae, dando un toque aún más misterioso a su leve sonrisa.{/n} «¡Shereen! El mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exaltado{/g} nos unió el día que cruzaste el umbral de Vladaym. Nos guio hasta el cargamento y dio Su bendición para su regreso. ¿Sabe lo que la gente de mi mundo dice cuando pasa algo así? "Lo que se gana es para compartirlo con los vecinos"».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}何十というキャンドルのきらめきに照らされて、ジェイの顔に浮かんだ微笑は一段と謎めいたものに見えた。{/n}「シャリーン！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}のお陰で、一緒にヴラダイムの敷居をまたげる日が来たわ。彼の導きで積み荷にたどり着き、取り戻すに至ったの。こんなとき、あたしの故郷では何て言うか知っているかしら？『得たものは隣人に与えよ』よ」
languages.original_text: {n}The flickering light of dozens of candles plays across Jae's face, making her small smile appear even more mysterious.{/n} "Shereen! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} Himself brought us together the day you crossed Vladaym's threshold. He led us to the cargo and gave His blessing for its return. Do you know what people on my world say when such a thing happens? 'What's gained is to be shared with your neighbour.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}何十というキャンドルのきらめきに照らされて、ジェイの顔に浮かんだ微笑は一段と謎めいたものに見えた。{/n}「シャリーン！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}エグザルテッド・ワン{/g}のお陰で、一緒にヴラダイムの敷居をまたげる日が来たわ。彼の導きで積み荷にたどり着き、取り戻すに至ったの。こんなとき、あたしの故郷では何て言うか知っているかしら？『得たものは隣人に与えよ』よ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}La lueur vacillante de dizaines de bougies danse sur le visage de Jae, de telle sorte que son petit sourire en coin paraît encore plus mystérieux.{/n} « Shereen ! L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} en personne nous a {mf|réunis|réunies} le jour où vous avez franchi le seuil de Vladaym. C'est Lui qui nous a {mf|menés|menées} jusqu'à la cargaison et qui nous a permis de la récupérer. Vous savez ce qu'on dit, dans mon monde, quand une telle chose se produit ? Qu'il faut partager les gains avec son voisin. »
languages.original_text: {n}The flickering light of dozens of candles plays across Jae's face, making her small smile appear even more mysterious.{/n} "Shereen! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} Himself brought us together the day you crossed Vladaym's threshold. He led us to the cargo and gave His blessing for its return. Do you know what people on my world say when such a thing happens? 'What's gained is to be shared with your neighbour.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}La lueur vacillante de dizaines de bougies danse sur le visage de Jae, de telle sorte que son petit sourire en coin paraît encore plus mystérieux.{/n} « Shereen ! L'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalté{/g} en personne nous a {mf|réunis|réunies} le jour où vous avez franchi le seuil de Vladaym. C'est Lui qui nous a {mf|menés|menées} jusqu'à la cargaison et qui nous a permis de la récupérer. Vous savez ce qu'on dit, dans mon monde, quand une telle chose se produit ? Qu'il faut partager les gains avec son voisin. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das flackernde Licht von Dutzenden von Kerzen scheint auf Jaes Gesicht und macht ihr schmales Lächeln noch geheimnisvoller.{/n} "Shereen! Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabene{/g} selbst hat uns am dem Tag zusammengeführt, als Ihr Vladayms Grenze überschritten habt. Er führte uns zu der Fracht und erteilte Seinen Segen für ihre Rückkehr. Wisst Ihr, was die Leute auf meiner Welt sagen, wenn so etwas passiert? 'Das Erhaltene muss mit dem Nachbarn geteilt werden.'"
languages.original_text: {n}The flickering light of dozens of candles plays across Jae's face, making her small smile appear even more mysterious.{/n} "Shereen! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} Himself brought us together the day you crossed Vladaym's threshold. He led us to the cargo and gave His blessing for its return. Do you know what people on my world say when such a thing happens? 'What's gained is to be shared with your neighbour.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das flackernde Licht von Dutzenden von Kerzen scheint auf Jaes Gesicht und macht ihr schmales Lächeln noch geheimnisvoller.{/n} "Shereen! Der {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Erhabene{/g} selbst hat uns am dem Tag zusammengeführt, als Ihr Vladayms Grenze überschritten habt. Er führte uns zu der Fracht und erteilte Seinen Segen für ihre Rückkehr. Wisst Ihr, was die Leute auf meiner Welt sagen, wenn so etwas passiert? 'Das Erhaltene muss mit dem Nachbarn geteilt werden.'"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: {n}Onlarca mumun titrek ışığı, Jae'ın yüzünde dans edip ufak gülümsemesini daha da esrarengizlik katıyor.{/n} "Şirinim! Vladaym'ın eşiğinden adım attığın gün, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli'nin{/g} ta kendisi bizi bir araya getirmiş. Kargoya giden yolu gösterip bize lütfunu bahşetmiş. Böyle şeyler olduğunda benim dünyamda ne denir, biliyor musun? 'İnsan, kazandığını komşusuyla paylaşmalı.' denir."
languages.original_text: {n}The flickering light of dozens of candles plays across Jae's face, making her small smile appear even more mysterious.{/n} "Shereen! The {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Exalted One{/g} Himself brought us together the day you crossed Vladaym's threshold. He led us to the cargo and gave His blessing for its return. Do you know what people on my world say when such a thing happens? 'What's gained is to be shared with your neighbour.'"

traits.locale_text: {n}Onlarca mumun titrek ışığı, Jae'ın yüzünde dans ediyor, ufak gülümsemesini daha da esrarengiz bir hâle çeviriyor.{/n} "Şirinim! Vladaym'ın eşiğinden adım attığın gün, {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Görkemli{/g}'nin ta Kendisi bizi bir araya getirmiş. Kargoya giden yolu gösterip hayırla iadesini sağlamış. Böyle bir şey yaşanınca benim dünyamda ne denir, biliyor musun? 'İnsan, kazandığını komşusuyla paylaşmalı.' denir."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
